titles.title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Finance, Trade and Monetary Policy.
Subcommittee on International Finance, Trade and Monetary Policy Discharged.

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 320.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

committee.subcommittee: International Finance, Trade and Monetary Policy
committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 9/16/1987--Introduced. Amends the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to make amounts in the Tied Aid Credit Fund available to reimburse the Export-Import Bank for the cost of any tied aid credits authorized by the Bank during FY 1987 and 1988.
